projects.name: AI FOR HEART
projects.description: Built website to diagnose coronary heart disease risk based on face recognition using Python Flask, OpenCV, Pandas and Tensorflow. Optimized time computation efficiency from machine learning's algorithm used by 25%. Performed application deployment on Google Cloud Platform using Google Cloud Run. Managed hosting and domain aiforheart.id during  PIMNAS's event.
projects.link: Not Available for Public due Copyright HKI, Contact Me or Yudha if you have interested

projects.name: Codion
projects.description: Codion is an application for detecting suspected cancerous object automatically using MoRbAC's Method. The MoRbAC method is a method for segmenting the entire object of an image combined with morphological operation to reduce errors in detecting suspected cancerous objects in ultrasound images.
projects.achievement: Article Publication on Jurnal Informatika Polinema

projects.name: COVI | Corona VS Us
projects.client: Personal Project with Wahyu Adi Ramadhan
projects.description: Built using Godot Game Engine and Figma. Participated at Lomba Aplikasi Mobile Kihajar 2020. Design game UI using Adobe XD and made video promotion and short walkthrough https://youtu.be/iytyFdXjBtg

projects.name: KOBI | Kamus Online Bahasa Isyarat
projects.description: Built sign language dictionary app for android using Kotlin and Firebase with Android Studio tools. Databases images and informations from Kamus Sistem Isyarat Bahasa Indonesia's book to Firebase.
